location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Peter Elwin Wrench, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra], to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter questions several reprimands for Jervis' actions and conduct, including:his lack of correspondence;his use of express boats;his lack of action and response to the issue of missing tin at Basra;the lack of confirmation from the Caun [Karim Khan] for the grants given to the English.The author also disagrees with Jervis' assertion that the Dutch may be intercepting letters that travel via Carrack [Kharg Island].
